name: Spidercide
description:
How to play: 

Find and Destroy 10 Spider Eggs in the Underground Laboratory.

Avoid the spiders.

The floor is lav- I mean, the floor is radioactive waste and will harm you!

Controls:

Keyboard and Mouse: 

ESC for Fullscreen

Enter for Pause menu

WASD for movement

Press and Hold "J" for Flamethrower.

Press "K" while left or right and you will perform a Sliding Dash.

"Spacebar" for Jump.

Gamepad:

Start/Options = Pause menu

D-Pad = Movement

X = Jump

Hold Square: Flamethrower

R2 = Slide-Dash

A game made for MINI JAM
